devdoc.author: The Moonbeam Team

DecisionDepositPlaced(uint32).details: Decision Deposit for a referendum has been placed

params.index: uint32 The index of the ongoing referendum that is not yet deciding

DecisionDepositRefunded(uint32).details: Decision Deposit for a closed referendum has been refunded

params.index: uint32 The index of the closed referendum

SubmittedAfter(uint16,uint32,bytes32).details: A referenda has been submitted after a given block

params.blockNumber: uint32 Block number after which it was set to be submitted
params.hash: bytes32 The hash of the proposal preimage

SubmittedAt(uint16,uint32,bytes32).details: A referenda has been submitted at a given block

params.blockNumber: uint32 Block number at which it was set to be submitted
params.hash: bytes32 The hash of the proposal preimage

placeDecisionDeposit(uint32).details: Post the Decision Deposit for a referendum

params.index: The index of the ongoing referendum that is not yet deciding

refundDecisionDeposit(uint32).details: Refund the Decision Deposit for a closed referendum back to the depositor

params.index: The index of a closed referendum with decision deposit still locked

refundSubmissionDeposit(uint32).details: Refund the Submission Deposit for a closed referendum back to the depositor

params.index: The index of a closed referendum with submission deposit still locked

params.block: Block number after which this will be executed
params.proposalHash: The proposed runtime call hash stored in the preimage pallet
params.trackId: The trackId corresponding to the origin from which the proposal is to be dispatched. The trackId => origin mapping lives in `runtime/governance/tracks.rs`

params.block: Block number at which this will be executed
params.proposalHash: The proposed runtime call hash stored in the preimage pallet
params.trackId: The trackId corresponding to the origin from which the proposal is to be dispatched. The trackId => origin mapping lives in `runtime/governance/tracks.rs`

devdoc.title: Pallet Referenda InterfaceThe interface through which solidity contracts will interact with the Referenda pallet

decidingCount(uint16).notice: Return the total count of deciding referenda per track

submissionDeposit().notice: Return the submission deposit for all referenda

trackInfo(uint16).notice: Return the governance parameters configured for the input TrackId
